description:
MSPs and admins often need to run reports for their clients. This new tool lets you easily create completely customized reports that streamline the process, enabling you to save time and show real value from any data source.

The OpenText™ Universal Reporter is a tool that allows the creation of custom reports using an API to connect to data sources. It can be downloaded from OpenText™ Core Endpoint Protection and is installed to any computer. It uses API connections to pull data from multiple data sources and allows comprehensive reports to be built showcasing the benefits from your entire security solution portfolio.
